Greetings to all,
I have recently added a Juyo Yamato Shikkake Katana to the gallery of my web site as well a new article for everyone's enjoyment. The article is entitled 
Various Nihonto and Tosogu Study Materials. The purpose of it is to 
provide an outlet for random short articles concerning Nihonto and Tosogu. 
Additional materials will be published there on a regular basis. Please 
have a look if you are so inclined. 

Best regards,
Danny 

http://www.nihontocraft.com/japanese_sword_home.html
